game.name: Ice-O-Matik
game.description:
Ice-O-Matik is one of the most favorite free online cooking games for kids. In this awesome girls game, your role is to take the orders of your customers and deliver them a perfect ice-cream in the shortest time possible. The quicker you will deliver their orders, the higher tip you will be able to receive from them. One thing that you must do in order to complete your task in this cool cooking game is to follow the game instructions with an open mind. Follow the proper order of ingredients, and sell your delicious dessert to achieve your goal before the time runs out. 

In this challenging flash game, a great machine will be given to you to help you create a perfect dessert for your beloved customers. All you need to do is press the buttons in the proper order and get it ready for selling right away. You are also free to cancel it in case if you have used the ingredients in the wrong order. Your major responsibility in this electrifying cooking game from the girls category is to please every customer who comes to your ice-cream shop. A happy customer will help you to score high in each level of this fantastic recreational activity for girls. 

As you will see that Ice-O-Matik is a robot game, so all you need to do is follow the instructions and apply them in the right order to deliver your ice-cream order timely. Kids will surely have great fun while getting a chance to own their own ice cream shop in this free online cooking game. Try to focus on sell as many ice-creams as possible in order to claim your victory at the end.
